gen:link.msg:message: `EmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpenses` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_EmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
